ygData.subject: Digest Number 76
ygData.msgSnippet: And what hunting grounds are you using to afford a bloodclaw at level 21 BTW? Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~ Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
ygData.messageBody:
And what hunting grounds are you using to afford a bloodclaw at level 21
BTW?

Oglug ~Hand of Chaos~



Message text written by INTERNET:warriors_eq@onelist.com
>Message: 4
Date: Sun, 27 Jun 1999 01:14:28 -0400
From: "Michael Wooldirdge" <mike@...>
Subject: Re: Bloodclaw

By the 21st level you can easily afoord a BloodClaw and he probably isn't
twinked. It's really not hard to gain money you just can't gain experience
then. Actually spellcasters have it bad well priests because of the
expensiveness of there spells plus every!
once in awhile a good spellcaster weapon comes along like Observer Staff
and you get it for 1000pp whil at level 24 your spells cost around 24pp a
piece. If you can't afford a BloodClaw by level 21 you need to rethink your
hunting grounds.
<
